text:
<@U01EJ7VE9FD> I 100% agree, this is super annoying. By the way, we use MonsterInsights with clients that use WP and love it – it’s unbelievable that they’re pushing it so heavily when developers at companies like MI can’t even support it yet.

<https://content-career-growth.slack.com/archives/CN9UCQ92A/p1610559337219900?thread_ts=1610547427.219100&cid=CN9UCQ92A>

attachments.fallback: [January 13th, 2021 9:35 AM] keri: I'm a bit biased as I work for the company that owns MonsterInsights (GA plugin for WordPress), but I think it's crazy how they released it without any courses, documentation, or API - and made it the default & pushed everyone to start using it right away. Why so rushed? Why not as a large-scale beta first? It's causing confusion and panic for a lot of people.
attachments.text: I'm a bit biased as I work for the company that owns MonsterInsights (GA plugin for WordPress), but I think it's crazy how they released it without any courses, documentation, or API - and made it the default & pushed everyone to start using it right away. Why so rushed? Why not as a large-scale beta first? It's causing confusion and panic for a lot of people.

elements.text: I 100% agree, this is super annoying. By the way, we use MonsterInsights with clients that use WP and love it – it’s unbelievable that they’re pushing it so heavily when developers at companies like MI can’t even support it yet.
